chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 mini is experiencing the following issue:
Could you contact the seller to update the order, which dates back to June 1. thank you
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer informs us that the product he received is a good condition, but not in perfect condition.

He wants the reversal of the price difference, which is 49.63 euros.

Otherwise, it will return the product.

Regards,

François from the Back Care Team

Hello,
My iPhone 13 mini is experiencing the following issue:
Dirty phone

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Rather than sending a return, would the customer be open to a 40 euros commercial gesture? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

The customer accepts the 40 euros.

Thank you for doing the right thing.

Regards,

François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the commercial gesture. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
